testcase.name: Open Main Menu with valid Credential

failure.message: Condition true expected:<Stockbit - [Investasi Saham Bersama Komunitas Saham Terbesar di] Indonesia> but was:<Stockbit - [Komunitas Saham] Indonesia>

testcase.failure:
